attributes.name: Keros type
attributes.description: The Keros classification is a method of classifying the depth of the olfactory fossa on a coronal CT image through the cribiform plate.

values.name: type I (0-3mm)
values.description: When the vertical depth of the fossa is less than 4 mm, it is designated as a Type I.

values.name: type II (4-7mm)
values.description: A Type II is 4-7 mm in depth.

values.name: type III (>7mm)
values.description: Type III is more than 7 mm
